title: Video-Based Science Learning Design for Students with Autism Spectrum Disorder

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for preservice or in-service teachers, featuring non-real-time classes using science-subject video content and an LMS. Instructors provide video design and feedback tailored to learner characteristics based on the ADDIE model.

learning_goals: Learners can explain video-based science concepts with over 80% accuracy
Learners can accurately replicate experimental procedures presented in videos three consecutive times
Within 15 minutes of video learning, learners can write and submit concept summary notes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
